name: EATON Design Patterns Library
description:
Welcome to the Brightlayer User Interface (Brightlayer UI) design pattern library! This is a design library that includes common patterns used across various Brightlayer UI projects. Feel free to copy and paste anything you like into your own projects.


Visit brightlayer-ui.github.io to learn more about our design patterns.


Changelog

  • Ported in all the design patterns from the old file to handle the process better internally.
